entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lac La Biche 01:00 AM MST Monday 06 February 2023
Temperature: 0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 74 %
Dewpoint: -3.2°C
Wind: WNW 36 km/h gust 47 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing rain. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then northwest 50 gusting to 70 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the morning then steady.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the morning then steady. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023
